52e169fc-fa97-465a-8b0c-95548e5d0c82.description: Earners of this designation have demonstrated an in-depth understanding of the Life Participation Approach to Aphasia through completing 8 modules/tests with 80%+ accuracy. Earners can describe equitable, person-centered care through collaborative goal setting and intervention; methods to improve success for people with aphasia and their loved ones; and strategies to promote communication access across the continuum of care. For more info, copy and paste www.AphasiaAccess.org/knowledgebadge/

alignments.description: Aphasia United is an international organization that is driving change by uniting the global aphasia community through partnerships with national and international researchers, clinicians, and consumers with a shared vision. It is an umbrella organization that represents the collective voices of existing aphasia organizations throughout the world.
